item.title: Suicide Note Pt. I
item.description: [[songs/s/stone_sour/stone_sour/bother.md#wish-i-was-too-dead-to-care-vyl-wnanory|Cheap cocaine, a dry inhale, the pills that kill and take the pain away (take the pain away)]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/stone_sour/bother.md#wish-i-was-too-dead-to-care-vyl-wnanory|Diet of life, shelter without, the face that cannot see inside yours and mine (yours and mine)]] Â [[songs/e/eminem/the_marshall_mathers_lp_2/rap_god.
